# How to handle the APIs ? Follow the guide ! 

```{r setup}
library(CorrClim)
```

# API usages

Here find different snippets to get data from `Meteo France`, `ENEDIS Open Data`.

First set up a proxy if needed.

```{r}

Sys.setenv(http_proxy = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv(https_proxy = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv(ftp_proxy = proxy_url)
Sys.setenv(no_proxy = ".edf.fr")

# Temperature timeseries from ENEDIS open data
extract_weather_enedis = api_get_weather_enedis(start_date = "2022-01-01", end_date = "2022-01-03")

# Get holidays from timewindow
extract_holidays = api_get_holidays(start_date = "2022-01-01", end_date = "2022-01-03")

# Get all stations from Meteo France in a specified departement
stations_list  = api_get_stations(departement = 78)

# Get all data from stations id specified from Meteo France
df_weather = api_get_weather_meteo_france(station_id = c("01014002"), date_start = as.Date('2023-01-01') , date_end = as.Date('2023-01-02'))
```
